description: The Crimson Prince Japanese Maple is a stunning specimen, with vibrant deep-crimson foliage and graceful, cascading branches. It is a graceful, slow-growing, deciduous tree that makes a fantastic addition to an outdoor space. Its ornamental foliage begins in shades of bright red in the spring, deepens in the summer and brightens to rich cranberry hues in the fall. Its delicate, lacy layered branches make for a striking silhouette against the sky year-round. With proper care, it can be enjoyed for many years to come!
